title: The Silicon Bubble Edition
description:
Silicon Valley hiring practices, free lunches, and stock buybacks on this week's episode with Emily Peck, Felix Salmon, and Anna Szymanski.
In the Slate Plus segment, Felix, Anna, and Emily discuss allegations of sexual misconduct involving CBS’s Les Moonves. 
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck.
Production by Laura Flynn and June Thomas.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
